Pure Glow.name: Pure Glow
Pure Glow.fullText:
Morninglord Attack 11Pure Glow

With a whispered prayer, a warm, white radiance spreads from you in waves that burn your foes with holy energy.

Encounter        Divine, Implement, Radiant
Standard Action      Close burst 5

Targets: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Intelligence vs. Will, Wisdom vs. Will, or Charisma vs. Will

Hit: 2d8 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier radiant damage.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, enemies that begin their turn in the burst take 10 radiant damage.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 59.
Pure Glow.flavor: With a whispered prayer, a warm, white radiance spreads from you in waves that burn your foes with holy energy.
Pure Glow.attack: Intelligence vs. Will, Wisdom vs. Will, or Charisma vs. Will
Pure Glow.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Pure Glow.effect: Until the end of your next turn, enemies that begin their turn in the burst take 10 radiant damage.

Rising Sun.name: Rising Sun
Rising Sun.fullText:
Morninglord Utility 12Rising Sun

Radiance emanating from you soothes the spirits and wounds of your allies, knitting rent flesh and granting them the strength they need to continue the fight.

Daily        Divine, Healing
Minor Action      Close burst 5

Targets: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: You and your allies regain hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.

Sustain Minor: Bloodied allies within 5 squares regain hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 59.
Rising Sun.flavor: Radiance emanating from you soothes the spirits and wounds of your allies, knitting rent flesh and granting them the strength they need to continue the fight.
Rising Sun.targets: You and each ally in the burst
Rising Sun.effect: You and your allies regain hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.
Rising Sun.sustainMinor: Bloodied allies within 5 squares regain hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Lance of Dawn.name: Lance of Dawn
Lance of Dawn.fullText:
Morninglord Attack 20Lance of Dawn

With eye-burning brilliance, a nimbus of radiant power streaks into your foe, filling your enemy with holy energy.

Daily        Divine, Implement, Radiant
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Intelligence vs. Will, Wisdom vs. Will, or Charisma vs. Will

Hit: 3d10 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier radiant damage.

Effect: Ongoing 5 radiant damage (save ends). Each time the target fails the saving throw against this ongoing damage, increase the ongoing damage by 5.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 59.
Lance of Dawn.flavor: With eye-burning brilliance, a nimbus of radiant power streaks into your foe, filling your enemy with holy energy.
Lance of Dawn.attack: Intelligence vs. Will, Wisdom vs. Will, or Charisma vs. Will
Lance of Dawn.onHit: 3d10 + Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Lance of Dawn.effect: Ongoing 5 radiant damage (save ends). Each time the target fails the saving throw against this ongoing damage, increase the ongoing damage by 5.
